item.description:
Save the date for the annual steak picnic at Northwest Park in Windsor, hosted by the Hartford Heights Tall Club.

Event Flier on HHTC Meetup

There will be volleyball and bocce before and after the Steak Roast. Sharon is in charge of marinating... (she is the best!) There will be salad, baked potato, vegetables and of course wonderfully grilled steaks! And for dessert, there will be brownies and Strawberry TALL-cake!

The park is available for hiking and exploration as well.

Plan to join in the fun - it's a great event!!!

PLEASE NOTE: You need to be a fully-fledged and paid-up BBTC Member - or a guest of a BBTC Member - in order to attend this event, since it is being hosted by another TCI Tall Club.

RSVP by June 10th with FULL payment of $25, directly to Hartford Heights Tall Club:

HHTC
1961 Poquonock Ave
Windsor, CT 06095

Any questions? Contact Karrie at 860-849-0025
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the path up to the 'Warming Shed' - Kevin and Linda from HHTC will be the event hosts.
item.why: What's not to love about summer BBQ's?!!
item.name: Ya?ll Tall Steak Out - 7th Annual Cowboy Bar-B-Q
